description: Ten years ago, Darn Tough created the Stripes sock, a well-rounded trail hiking staple in the Darn Tough arsenal. Today, they celebrate a decade of durability, comfort, and Merino Wool warmth with a new design. Who knows, these socks might just last you the next decade (they will).
name: Darn Tough Socks Decade Stripe Micro Crew Midweight Cushion Socks - Mens

specs.value: Midweight - Additional warmth and protection are the signature characteristics of midweight yarns in the Hike
Micro Crew - Shorter, more concise take on the traditional crew height. Peeks just above the top of a standard hiking boot
No slipping, no bunching, and no blisters
Unprecedented durability and their unique “put it on, forget it’s on” feel
Pulls moisture away from skin. Fast drying
Cool in the summer, warm in the winter
The ultimate fiber for breathability and comfort in all conditions
Undetectable seam fusion for an ultra smooth, invisible feel
